creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
description: wood tray with scalloped ends; metal holders for glasses and decanters: four circular decanter holders; two levels of glasses holders, eight on bottom level and eight on upper; upper level glasses rest on metal holder with star cut-outs in base handle at top to left tray
title: Tray, from a cordial set
